autoGenerate.title: Auto Content Generation

authorAssignment.title: Interpreter Assignment
authorAssignment.description: Configure how interpreters (authors) are assigned during content generation.
authorAssignment.algorithmHint: Round Robin: Assigns to interpreter with fewest total posts
authorAssignment.specialtyMatchDescription: Prefer interpreters with matching specialty for the category.
authorAssignment.fallbackDescription: Assign based on language match if specialty match fails.

schedule.title: Execution Schedule
schedule.disabledMessage: Disabled. Auto generation will not run.
schedule.specificDays: Run on Specific Days (Leave empty for daily)
schedule.specificMonths: Run in Specific Months (Leave empty for monthly)

options.includeRagDescription: Search related context from vector DB to improve content quality.
options.includeImagesDescription: Generate images automatically using Google Imagen 4.
options.autoPublishDescription: Automatically publish content after generation (without review).
options.priorityThresholdHint: Only process keywords with this priority or higher (0 = process all)

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about medical tourism in Korea

1.question: What is medical tourism?
1.answer: Medical tourism is when patients travel to another country to receive medical treatment. Korea is a top destination known for advanced healthcare facilities and competitive prices.

2.question: Why choose Korea for medical treatment?
2.answer: Korea offers world-class medical facilities, highly trained doctors, advanced technology, and competitive prices. Many hospitals are JCI-accredited and offer services in multiple languages.

3.question: Do I need a visa for medical treatment in Korea?
3.answer: Many countries have visa-free agreements with Korea for short stays. For longer treatments, you may need a medical tourism visa (C-3-3 or G-1-10). We can assist with visa-related documentation.

1.question: How do I book a consultation?
1.answer: You can request a free consultation through our website. Fill out the inquiry form with your medical needs, and our team will connect you with suitable hospitals within 24 hours.

2.question: Can I communicate with doctors in my language?
2.answer: Yes! We provide professional medical interpreters who speak your language. They will assist you throughout your medical journey, from consultation to aftercare.

3.question: How far in advance should I book?
3.answer: We recommend booking at least 2-4 weeks in advance for most procedures. Complex surgeries may require more planning time. Our team can help you plan the optimal timeline.

1.question: What payment methods are accepted?
1.answer: Most hospitals accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard), bank transfers, and cash. Some procedures may require a deposit before confirmation.

2.question: Are there any hidden fees?
2.answer: No hidden fees. We provide transparent pricing that includes all medical costs. Additional services like accommodation and transportation are quoted separately.

3.question: Can I get a refund if I cancel?
3.answer: Cancellation policies vary by hospital and procedure. Generally, cancellations made 7+ days before the appointment are fully refundable. Please check specific policies when booking.
